emuInput.TitMainTitle: Three houses, one with hexagon Insulbrick, with severe fire and water damage after six-alarm fire, Jewel Street, Polish Hill
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 21, 1956, pg. 3, reads: "Heroic Action Here - Refuse collectors Paul Sweeney and Kenneth Kiney caught 62-year-old Mrs. Anna Helwich as she leaped from the second-story window of the center structure during the whiplashing fire which also forced nearby neighbors Michael Kobus and the John Hanners to flee. - Harris Photo."
